name: HospitalManagement
description: Contract module which provides a basic HospitalManagement control mechanism, where there is an account (an owner) that can be granted exclusive access to specific functions. By default, the owner account will be the one that deploys the contract. This can later be changed with {transferOwnership}.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Handle events. Emitted when ETH are Received by this wallet.

functionDecorators.name: approveAppoinment
functionDecorators.description: the admin can approve the appoinment. Throws if called by any account other than the owner.

functionDecorators.name: approveDoctor
functionDecorators.description: the admin can approve the doctoor. Throws if called by any account other than the owner.

functionDecorators.name: doctorRegister
functionDecorators.description: doctor can register with unique NPI no. Throws if already register by account .

functionDecorators.name: getappoinment
functionDecorators.description: the patient can apply for appoinment their details to get appoinmentr. Throws if not register by account.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: patientTreatment
functionDecorators.description: doctor Review the patient details and start the required treatment process. the treatment details and approve it. Throws if called by any account other than the doctor.

functionDecorators.name: patientregister
functionDecorators.description: the patient can register their details to get appoinmentr. Throws if already register by account.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: treatmentStatus
functionDecorators.description: doctor Review the patient details and start the required treatment process. doctor updating the treatment process. Throws if called by any account other than the doctor.
